metadata.title: CVE-2023-38060 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ContentType parameter forattachments on TicketCreate or TicketUpdate operations of the OTRS GenericInterface modules allows any authenticated attacker to to perform an hostheader injection for the ContentType header of the attachment. This issueaffects OTRS: from 7.0.X before 7.0.45, from 8.0.X before 8.0.35; ((OTRS))Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
